title: Will new mom Tiffany Trump intro baby Boulos at Army birthday celebration
shortDescription: Tiffany Trump and Michael Boulos welcomed a baby boy, Alexander Trump Boulos, at 4:44 am May 15, 2025. Grandpa Donald Trump turns 79 on June 14, 2025.

title: Map: See route of Trump's June 14 military parade
shortDescription: The U.S. Army is marking its 250th anniversary with a dramatic procession through the streets of the nation’s capital Saturday, June 14. Here's where.

title: US judge blocks Trump administration from overhauling federal elections
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Denise Casper in Boston issued a preliminary injunction at the behest of 19 Democratic-led states.

title: Trump says Iran nuke deal 'hardliners' killed in Israel strikes
shortDescription: The president said in a call with CNN that Iran should negotiate with the U.S. 'before it's too late.'

title: Trump loses appeal to overturn $5 million loss to E. Jean Carroll
shortDescription: A divided 2nd U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals has left intact its Dec. 30 decision upholding a $5 million verdict against Donald Trump.

title: Trump gives update on whether rain could cancel big military parade
shortDescription: The National Weather Service forecast for Washington D.C. on June 14 has a 50% chance of rain, with thunderstorms possible.

title: When is Trump’s DC military parade? See full festival schedule
shortDescription: The parade and festival, coinciding with Trump’s birthday and Flag Day, will last nearly sun-up to sun-down. Here's a full schedule of the day's events.

title: Trump warns Iran after Israel attacks, says US knew strike was coming
shortDescription: "There has already been great death and destruction, but there is still time to make this slaughter... come to an end," Trump wrote on social media.

title: Take a look at the last large military parade in Washington DC
shortDescription: Thousands of soldiers, military equipment and more are set for this weekend in Washington D.C. for the U.S. Army's 250th anniversary celebration.

title: Greenland isn't for sale. Despite Trump, it wants Americans to visit.
shortDescription: As Trump vows to "get Greenland," direct flights from the U.S. are starting. What reception will Americans get?

title: Americans split on Trump's use of military in ICE protests: Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
shortDescription: About half of Americans are supportive of Trump's move, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll.

title: Why these college students are wary of the GOP megabill
shortDescription: An outspoken group of college students is wary of the GOP megabill. Here's why.

title: Democrats react to Sen. Padilla incident
shortDescription: Rep. Max Frost called for Congress to "subpoena Kristi Noem" after Sen. Padilla was forced out of a DHS presser.

title: Trump DOJ sues NY over immigration enforcement in state courts
shortDescription: New York's 2020 law doesn’t apply to federal courthouses or immigration court, according to the legislation’s author.

title: House votes to rescind billions in funding
shortDescription: Republican lawmakers won a House vote 214-212 to take back billions in public broadcasting and foreign aid funding.
